      • BlackHole

        public BlackHole(float x,
                 float y,
                 int r,
                 Background background,
                 boolean placed)
        Constructor of BlackHole
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the black hole
        y - The y position of the black hole
        r - The rotation of the black hole
        Background - The background black hole will be displayed on
        placed - Determines if the turret has been placed or not

    • Method Detail

      • calcMoveCursor

        public void calcMoveCursor(int x,
                           int y,
                           int minX,
                           int minY,
                           int maxX,
                           int maxY)
        This function moves the current tower to the x and y of the mouse and limits it within the ranges supplied
        Parameters:
        x - This is the x coordinate of the mouse
        y - This is the y coordinate of the mouse
        minX - This is the minimum x value that the tower can be set to
        minY - This is the minimum y value that the tower can be set to
        maxX - This is the maximum x value that the tower can be set to (Width of the window)
        maxY - This is the maximum y value that the tower can be set to (Height of the window)

      • renderBorder

        public void renderBorder(RenderWindow window,
                         boolean intersects)
        This function draws a circle around the base of the tower and changes colour depending if there has been an intersection
        Parameters:
        window - This is the games render window
        intersects - The boolean which is set based off an intersection

      • within

        public boolean within(int x,
                      int y)
        This function checks if a point lies within the towers range
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point being checked
        y - The y coordinate of the point being checked
        Returns:
        This returns a boolean based off if the intersection is true

      • within

        public boolean within(int x,
                      int y,
                      int r)
        This function checks if a point lies within a specified range
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point being checked
        y - The y coordinate of the point being checked
        r - The r is the maximum radius you will check if there is an intersection
        Returns:
        This returns a boolean based off if the intersection is true
